duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop biophysical assays to characterize affinity reagents and collaborate cross-functionally to incorporate these reagents in the Nautilus platform.
Develop methods to determine candidate probes' success likelihood within the platform and better understand specific, off-target, and non-specific binding of affinity reagent candidates.
Document and present results and insights at departmental and cross-functional project team meetings.
Engage external partners to drive collaborative activities efficiently.
Stay up to date with the latest advancements and trends in biophysics and contribute to the organization's intellectual environment.

education_certification.credential: PhD in Biophysics, Chemistry, Physics, or related biological/life science field (BS/MS with 8+ years of experience may be considered)
